Key Match Events: LeBron James scored 16 points in a three-minute span to help the Lakers to a 131-127 win over the Sacramento Kings
Post-Match Reflections: LeBron James expressed pride in his team's effort after the comeback win
Miscellaneous Highlights: Anthony Davis put up 31 points and registered his third straight 30-point game, tying a franchise record for the most consecutive 30-point games to start the season with Elgin Baylor, Jerry West and Kobe Bryant
Others: Every Lakers starter had 16 points or more
